award.title: St. Xaviers College of Engineering Cybersecurity

feedback_header.title: Success Stories from Our Students
feedback_header.subtitle: Hear from our graduates who have transformed their careers with our courses

testimonials.name: Sibi Kumar
testimonials.quote: Hi sir, I am Sibikumar from psvpec. Like to share my experience about our ethical hacking class, the ethical hacking class was very useful and for the first time I learned about ethical hacking. It satisfied as I expected. The way of your teaching is also very interactive and practical session helped me a lot. These classes made me interested to learn about ethical hacking.

testimonials.name: Dinesh Kumar K
testimonials.achievement: Certified in mobile app penetration testing and web bug bounty.
testimonials.quote: I recently earned a $500 bounty from a HackerOne program. I come from a commerce background, and the courses at Cappriciosec University have been instrumental in helping me start a career in the cybersecurity field. I am currently working at a Chennai-based startup cybersecurity company and have enrolled in courses on mobile app penetration testing and web bug bounty.

testimonials.name: Sai Venkat G
testimonials.quote: First of all a heartfelt thanks to you Bro and I’m grateful for the passion and hard work you bring every day. I have chosen a Ethical Hacking (cybersecurity) course to improve the skills. You are teaching more than a teacher, guiding like a friend. I have learned newly detailed concepts about cybersecurity and ethical hacking because of you bro. Thank you. You made complex concepts simple and easy to understand. More than technical skills, you've instilled a mindset of vigilance, responsibility, and ethics that will stay with me.

testimonials.name: Jayesri A
testimonials.quote: I discovered a code injection bug in one of Google's Android apps, and Google acknowledged my work by providing me with a place in their Hall of Fame. Encouraged by this recognition, I enrolled in Cappricio University's Mobile Application Pen-Testing course. In this course, I delved deep into concepts such as Android static code analysis, iOS dynamic hacking, and malware exploit development.

testimonials.name: Pranav Kataria
testimonials.quote: My name is Pranav Kataria, Assistant Commissioner of Gujarat Police. I have learned many valuable skills from Cappriciosec University, but my favorite topics are RF hacking, mobile tracking, Internet Protocol Detail Records, hacking social accounts and mobile devices, tracking cyber criminals, ATM card cloning, and more. These topics have given me insights into how cybercriminals take advantage of cybercrime and how to track them. I enrolled in the Cyber Crime Investigation course. Thank you for offering this course.

testimonials.name: Sandiyo Christan
testimonials.quote: I discovered an authentication bypass and earned $200 for finding a bug in one of Bugcrowd's programs. Afterward, I enrolled in web app penetration testing and bug bounty, as well as mobile application bug bounty courses at Cappriciosec University. These courses significantly enhanced my knowledge and provided me with real-time experience in cybersecurity.

testimonials.name: Anonymous
testimonials.quote: I have chosen a Ethical Hacking (cybersecurity) course to improve the skills. You are teaching more than a teacher, guiding like a friend. I have learned newly detailed concepts about cybersecurity and ethical hacking because of you bro. Thank you. You made complex concepts simple and easy to understand. More than technical skills, you've instilled a mindset of vigilance, responsibility, and ethics that will stay with me.

testimonials.name: Farheen Fathima N K
testimonials.quote: This IoT and hardware development course exceeded my expectations! It offered a perfect balance of hands-on projects and foundational knowledge, making complex topics easy to understand. The instructor was exceptional—clear, incredibly knowledgeable, and dedicated to ensuring we fully grasped each concept. From day one, I felt engaged and empowered to build real-world IoT solutions. If you’re looking to gain practical IoT skills from the ground up, this course is an excellent choice!

testimonials.name: Anonymous
testimonials.quote: Your teachings made us gain knowledge not only in ethical hacking but also helped us learn what happens behind every system process. Your classes enabled us to change our perspective on day-to-day tasks.

about.title: Cappriciosec University
about.description: We provide high-quality courses in cyber security, development, and hardware to help you advance your career and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
